rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: I love Dr. Lesher's class. The material is really interesting and there's not nearly as much reading as you would expect for this kind of class, though there is a fair bit. His grading is super easy, which is great. The lectures can be kind of long, but again super interesting. I definitely want to take another class with him.

I love Prof. Lesher! He is such a nice guy and he is always there to help you and clarify any material you didn't understand. He grades really fairly and he makes all the material really interesting. I would definitely recommend taking this class!
